title: How animal life begins
brief_description: Portrays the ovulation, fertilization and early development of the mammalian egg. Scenes of spermatizoa attacking the ovum, and time-lapse micro-photographs of cell division in the fertilized egg.
description: Portrays the ovulation, fertilization and early development of the mammalian egg. Scenes of spermatizoa attacking the ovum, and time-lapse micro-photographs of cell division in the fertilized egg.
